item.title:
More urban rewilding, Music For Growing Flowers Pt. 5 is out Friday. As a small thank you for listening, it’s the main theme performed solo on orchestral harp 🌱
https://mkx.lnk.to/GrowingFlowers 12” / DL / Seeds
📷 Antony Kitson
item.dc:creator: @ErlandCooper

item.title:
RT by @ErlandCooper: We are delighted that This Classical Life: Live from @OldWoollen is being broadcasted on @BBCRadio3 on Tue 5 July at 7.30pm.
Put it in your diary now!
More info https://bbc.in/3QSQHR8

item.title:
A joyful tour of Orkney with @EmilyPKnight & @alex_kozobolis for @BBCR4OC @BBCRadio4 We also made a visit to my tape planting site, finding the rune stone that marks the spot🕊
Now on @BBCSounds

item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: #TowerSuperbloom @TowerOfLondon just after sunset looks so magical ✨️ 🌼 🌸 🌻 From 1st July we will be open until late so you can enjoy our beautiful flowers all lit up as well. 😍
item.dc:creator: @RhiannonJG
item.description:
#TowerSuperbloom @TowerOfLondon just after sunset looks so magical ✨️ 🌼 🌸 🌻
From 1st July we will be open until late so you can enjoy our beautiful flowers all lit up as well. 😍

item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: My debut album Phrases is out today @delphianrecords: https://orcd.co/heloise-phrases - featuring all these 🌟s: @AmyHarmanBsn @lsnowdenguitar @danjshao @CalumHuggan @CellinAlexander Lawrence Power @jsphnstphnsn @nicomuhly @CherylHoad @zkm555 @ElaineMitchener @oliverleith & Aperghis ♥️

item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: New song alert! Very proud to be part of this epic collaboration. Check out my new song ‘One Eye Open’ now: https://open.spotify.com/track/0syiwa71sBXVgW3CUHG1fF?si=6uz7Ym7PRM29MMK0nhNYjQ @BirdsongProject #forthebirds
item.dc:creator: @DouglasDare
item.description: New song alert! Very proud to be part of this epic collaboration. Check out my new song ‘One Eye Open’ now: open.spotify.com/track/0syiw… @BirdsongProject #forthebirds

item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: We are working with ecologists to regularly assess the wildlife in the moat and monitor how it is changing 🦋 Our principal ambition is to create a haven for pollinators and Superbloom is just the beginning of that journey! 🐝
item.dc:creator: @TowerOfLondon
item.description: We are working with ecologists to regularly assess the wildlife in the moat and monitor how it is changing 🦋 Our principal ambition is to create a haven for pollinators and Superbloom is just the beginning of that journey! 🐝

item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: Last night I captured one of my best images to date. Probably the single most important event in a Guillemot's life. Unable to yet fly, a 3-week-old chick leaps off the cliff, following its dad who will teach it how to fend for itself out at sea over the coming weeks.
item.dc:creator: @Naturalist_Sam
item.description: Last night I captured one of my best images to date. Probably the single most important event in a Guillemot's life. Unable to yet fly, a 3-week-old chick leaps off the cliff, following its dad who will teach it how to fend for itself out at sea over the coming weeks.

item.title: R to @ErlandCooper: He wrote some of his most celebrated music in a tiny bothy on the island Hoy, off clock time, a daily rhythm of wild time, shaped by weather & friendship.
item.dc:creator: @ErlandCooper
item.description: He wrote some of his most celebrated music in a tiny bothy on the island Hoy, off clock time, a daily rhythm of wild time, shaped by weather & friendship.

item.title:
In tribute to Peter Maxwell Davies’s long association with the @BBCPhilharmonic I’ll premier a new piece ‘Window onto Rackwick’ on October 15th @BridgewaterHall
https://bbc.in/3NDjbMN
📷 @alex_kozobolis Rackwick Bay, Hoy, Orkney
item.dc:creator: @ErlandCooper
item.description:
In tribute to Peter Maxwell Davies’s long association with the @BBCPhilharmonic I’ll premier a new piece ‘Window onto Rackwick’ on October 15th @BridgewaterHall

bbc.in/3NDjbMN

📷 @alex_kozobolis Rackwick Bay, Hoy, Orkney

item.title: RT by @ErlandCooper: Super excited to have booked tickets for a gig possibly a silent one, in 2024, to hear @ErlandCooper perform Carve the runes then be content with silence, as it sounds from the ground. Hopefully a couple more trips to Orkney before then to continue my fascination with these isles
item.dc:creator: @AndyHarrod79
item.description: Super excited to have booked tickets for a gig possibly a silent one, in 2024, to hear @ErlandCooper perform Carve the runes then be content with silence, as it sounds from the ground. Hopefully a couple more trips to Orkney before then to continue my fascination with these isles

item.title:
Carve the Runes, newsletter summer solstice Clue4. To subscribers, the latest was shared. For those that enjoy an abstract puzzle, this forms part of 6 sections of a map to my planted album. All info, manifesto, Q&A’s curated here 🕊
http://contentwithsilence.com
item.dc:creator: @ErlandCooper
item.description:
Carve the Runes, newsletter summer solstice Clue4. To subscribers, the latest was shared. For those that enjoy an abstract puzzle, this forms part of 6 sections of a map to my planted album. All info, manifesto, Q&A’s curated here 🕊
